text.name: text
text.description: Text to display as a title of chart

align.name: align
align.description: Alignment of title relative to chart area.

margin.name: margin
margin.description: Vertical spacing around the title text

offsetX.name: offsetX
offsetX.description: Sets the left offset for title text

offsetY.name: offsetY
offsetY.description: Sets the top offset for title text

floating.name: floating
floating.description: The floating option will take out the title text from the chart area and make it float on top of the chart.

children.name: fontSize
children.description: Font Size of the title text

children.name: fontWeight
children.description: Font Weight of the title text

children.name: fontFamily
children.description: Font Family of the title text

children.name: color
children.description: Fore color of the title text
